topics.title: Overview
topics.content:
## KanBoss

Project-scoped Kanban boards with AI-powered automation. Create boards with customizable states and swimlanes, assign AI agents to automate work, and track card progress with labels, priorities, and WIP limits.

topics.title: Key Features
topics.content:
## Key Features

**Boards** — Click **+ New** to create a board. Each board starts with three states (Todo, In Progress, Done) and a Default swimlane.

**Cards** — Cards live at the intersection of a state (column) and swimlane (row). Click **+ Add** in any cell. Cards support colored labels and five priority levels.

**WIP Limits** — Set a maximum card count per column. Over-limit columns are highlighted to prevent bottlenecks.

**Automation** — Mark a state as **Automatic** with execution and evaluation prompts. Assign a durable agent to a swimlane. When a card enters an automatic state, a quick agent executes the task and a separate agent evaluates the result. On success, the card advances; on failure, it retries (up to max retries) or is marked stuck.

**Per-State Evaluation** — Each automatic state can have its own evaluation prompt, letting you tailor success criteria per pipeline stage.

**Zoom** — Scale the board view between 50% and 200%.

topics.title: Commands
topics.content:
## Commands

Available from the command palette:

| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| **Refresh Boards** | Reloads the board list and card data |
| **Create New Board** | Opens the board creation dialog |

topics.title: Permissions
topics.content:
## Permissions

| Permission | Why it's needed |
|------------|----------------|
| **logging** | Log diagnostic information for troubleshooting |
| **storage** | Persist boards, cards, labels, and automation state |
| **agents** | Spawn quick agents for automation and manage durable agents |
| **commands** | Register command palette entries |
| **notifications** | Show alerts for automation results and card state changes |
| **navigation** | Focus agent panels during automation runs |
| **widgets** | Render completed agent summaries in run history |
| **theme** | Adapt colors and styles to the current theme |
